select l_l.id, l_l.lecture_no, l_l.lecture_name, l_l.create_date, l_l.delete_date, l.start_date, l.end_date, u.name from lecture_list l_l left join lecture l in l_l.lecture_no = l.lecture_no left join user u on l.id = u.id where id = #{ id }
and (lecture_name like '%${ keyword }%' or user.user_name like '%${ keyword }%')
and lecture_name like '%${ keyword }%'
and u.user_name like '%${ keyword }%'
order by no desc limit # {offset },10

select a.assign_no, a.lecture_no, a.assign_name, a.assign_note, a.assign_method, a.end_date, l.lecture_name as lecture_name, u.user_name as teacher_name from assignment a join lecture l on a.lecture_no = l.lecture_no join user u on l.id = u.id where assign_no = #{ assign_no }

select distinct u.id, u.user_name, r.report_no, f.score from lecture_list l_l join user u on l_l.id = u.id left join assignment a on l_l.lecture_no = a.lecture_no left join report r on r.assign_no = #{ assign_no } and u.id = r.id left join feedback f on r.report_no = f.report_no where l_l.lecture_no = #{ lecture_no } order by u.user_name asc
mapper.insert: insert into report (assign_no, id, report_note) values (#{ assign_no }, #{ id }, #{ report_note })
mapper.select: select r.report_no, r.assign_no, r.id, r.report_note, r.create_date, r.delete_date, a.assign_name, l.lecture_name, u1.user_name as student_name, u2.user_name as teacher_name from report r left join assignment a on r.assign_no = a.assign_no left join lecture l on a.lecture_no = l.lecture_no left join user u1 on r.id = u1.id left join user u2 on l.id = u2.id where report_no = #{ report_no }
mapper.insert: insert into file (report_no, p_name, f_name, file_size, extension, file_path) values (#{ report_no }, #{ p_name }, #{ f_name }, #{ file_size }, #{ extension }, #{ file_path })
mapper.select: select file_no, report_no, p_name, f_name, create_date, delete_date, file_size, extension, file_path from file where file_no = #{ file_no }
select * from file where report_no = #{ report_no } order by file_no asc
mapper.delete: delete from file where file_no = #{ file_no }
mapper.select: select report_no, id, feedback, score from feedback where report_no = #{ report_no }
mapper.insert: insert into question (assign_no, id, quest_note) values (#{ assign_no }, #{ id }, #{ quest_note })
mapper.delete: delete from question where quest_no = #{ quest_no }
mapper.select: select q.quest_no, q.assign_no, q.id, q.quest_note, q.create_date, q.delete_date, u.user_name as user_name from question q join user u on q.id = u.id where q.assign_no = #{ assign_no } and q.delete_date is null order by q.create_date desc
select a.quest_no, a.id, a.answer_note, a.create_date, a.delete_date, u.user_name as user_name from answer a left join user u on a.id = u.id where quest_no = #{ quest_no }

select distinct a.assign_no as assign_no, l.lecture_name as lecture_name, a.assign_name as assign_name, u.user_name as teacher_name, datediff(a.end_date, now()) as days_left from assignment a join lecture l on a.lecture_no = l.lecture_no join user u on l.id = u.id join lecture_list l_l on a.lecture_no = l_l.lecture_no where not exists ( select 1 from report r where r.assign_no = a.assign_no and l_l.id = #{ id } ) and datediff(a.end_date, now()) >= 1 order by days_left asc
